description: An in-depth magazine about submachine guns and shooting.  There is an exhaustive article about close quarter combat techniques in the front.

variants.description: An in-depth magazine about submachine guns and shooting.  There is an exhaustive article about close quarter combat techniques in the front.

name.str_pl: copies of The MP5 Submachine Gun

variants.description: Small shiny journal about most famous machine gun in the world - H&K MP5, and how it is used currently..

name.str_pl: issues of Guns & Weapons for Law Enforcement

variants.description: Relatively old issue about modern automatic firearms police may use.  This copy talks about submachine guns and brand new KRISS Super V .45 ACP specifically.

name.str_pl: copies of The Submachine Gun Handbook

description: This concise guide details the proper care and operation of most forms of machine pistols and submachine guns currently used by regular armed and reserve forces, as well as several obsolete weapons.

name.str_pl: copies of The Submachine Gun Handbook

variants.description: This concise guide details the proper care and operation of most forms of machine pistols and submachine guns currently used by regular armed and reserve forces, as well as several obsolete weapons.
The full story on Gordon Ingram and his revolutionary designs of machine guns - Model 6, MAC-10, MAC-11 and SWD.

name.str: The Development of Sub-Machine Guns and their Ammunition from World War 1 to the Present Day
name.str_pl: copies of The Development of Sub-Machine Guns and their Ammunition from World War 1 to the Present Day

variants.description: A comprehensive study of the development and use of the sub-machine gun since World War I, including a country by country survey of equipment used, with lot of illustration and precise information.
Fully illustrated book about famous submachine guns, their design, construction, and testing, as well as their accessories such as magazines, ammunition, webbing, and cleaning kits.
Big series about weapons and their complexity, this issue describe a long and huge story of M1A1 Thompson Submachine gun - when it was created, why, and why it is iconic now.

name.str: An Amateur's Guide for the Colt's Thompson Submachine Gun
name.str_pl: copies of An Amateur's Guide for the Colt's Thompson Submachine Gun

variants.description: 200-page collector's manual to buy a real, old Tommy Gun, with detailed info of each model, info about maintenance and shooting, and stories about it usage in St. Louis Police Department.
Part of old army field manual, this book explain the usage and maintenance of M3 and M3A1, that was adopted in U.S. Army service in 1942.

name.str: Maintenance on the MP40, PPSH41, M3A1, and Sten MKII Submachine Guns
name.str_pl: copies of Maintenance on the MP40, PPSH41, M3A1, and Sten MKII Submachine Guns

variants.description: Short manual about disassembly, reassembly, maintenance, operation, and repair of some old machine guns.  Seems it has lack of some info, but better than nothing.
